shows.title: Relationship Techniques
shows.first_half: Well-known relationship author John Gray joins Connie Willis (info) for the full program. He'll discuss love in the era of AI, and how he helps men and women better understand and respect their differences in personal and professional relationships. Further, he'll share communication techniques, and nutritional choices that create the brain and body chemistry for lasting health, happiness, and romance.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 8/22/96 when, during a night of Open Lines, callers reacted to the breaking news about flight TWA 800 and the possibility the plane was brought down by either a bomb or missile.

shows.title: Secrecy & UFO Disclosure / Paranormal Encounters
shows.first_half: Second Half: Attorney and Wyoming State Director of MUFON Richard Beckwith joins George Knapp for a discussion on his new book on the evolution of secrecy laws in the US, and the ongoing battle for UFO disclosure. He'll delve into what form disclosure will take and what the stakes are.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher of paranormal mysteries Andy Thomas will explore the themes of his new book, "Strange," which features the extraordinary paranormal experiences reported by ordinary people, drawn from over three decades of his research. The book challenges mainstream skepticism, arguing that reality is far more complex than conventional science suggests.

shows.title: Violent Crime / Non-Human Intelligences
shows.first_half: First Half: Expert on crime, John R. Lott, will discuss recent mass public shootings and violent incidents such as in NYC, Fort Stewart military base, and the recent knife attack at a Walmart in Michigan. He'll offer an analysis of these attacks and suggest how similar crimes in general might be stopped.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and researcher Steve Mera will bring us his work on ‘The Phenomena Project,’ a 13-year scientific study into paranormal mechanics and communication with non-human intelligences (NHI). Mera reports that through the process of séance and ritualistic practice, he was able to establish communication with the NHI.

shows.title: Luck & Manifestation / ET Origins & Messages
shows.guests: Dr. Joe Gallenberger, Constance Victoria Briggs
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Joseph Gallenberger is a clinical psychologist and expert in psychokinesis. He'll discuss people experiencing unexpected success and luck after using his guided meditation program, reports of healing and manifestation, and the expansion of offerings at the Monroe Institute.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author, researcher, and public speaker Constance Victoria Briggs will explore the connection between extraterrestrials and Earth, both past and present. She'll delve into various theories regarding ET involvement in human origins and present signs and messages from ETs, and analyze what they might be attempting to tell us.

shows.title: Hollow Earth Theory / Graveyard Stories
shows.first_half: First Half: Brooks Agnew is a master engineer with multiple patents who consulted for the Fortune 100 for more than 30 years. He'll share his latest research on the theory that the Earth is hollow, including the core, diameter, and characteristics of a hollow Earth.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and speaker Tui Snider will bring us the stories she has gathered from her cemetery travel memoir, including voodoo rituals and being mistaken for a ghost. Tui traveled from Texas to Transylvania, visiting graveyards, and will share her love for cemeteries and the amazing events that transpired during her travels.

shows.title: Mapping Atlantis / UAP Revelations
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and former Army counterintelligence agent David Edward brings us information on the lost continent of Atlantis. Based on Plato’s writings, he has concluded that only one location meets his geographical markers, and from this anchor point, the ten provinces of the Atlantean empire can be mapped.
shows.second_half: Second Half: C2C's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones presents her interview with former NASA flight surgeon Dr. Gregory Rogers. He'll share his insights after more than 30 years of secrecy regarding UFO reverse-engineering, and discuss the push for full transparency on UFOs/UAPs and non-human technologies.

shows.title: Angel Communication / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Michael André Ford is an angel intuitive who helps people hear and see angels. He'll discuss his belief that angels are here to provide 24/7 assistance, and that humankind is ready for more compassion and kindness through angels and other loving beings. His message is that using direct interactions will lead to moving beyond fear and doubt into a space of healing, love, and true transformation. Followed by Open Lines. Give George a call and talk about whatever is on your mind!
